originalTitle: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
content: Yoweri Museveni has won a record seventh term in elections after promising that the fledgling oil sector will boost the economy.

originalTitle: 'I want to show the world what Africa is': YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
title: 'I want to show the world what Africa is': YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
content: "I love the love in Africa. The energy here is crazy," he says on his maiden tour of the continent.

originalTitle: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
title: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
content: Forward Sadio Mane looks to help inspire Senegal to glory against host nation Morocco after the 33-year-old said this will be his "last Afcon final".

title: Chile forest fire death toll rises to 16 as state of emergency declared
content: Chilean President Gabriel Boric ‍has announced a ‍state of emergency in two southern regions.

title: How much of Trump’s foreign policy is driven by minerals and oil?
content: Oil industry expert Daniel Yergin argues that the US is desperate to have supply chains independent of China.

title: Trump announces new tariffs over Greenland: How have EU allies responded?

title: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
content: The US president threatens to impose tariffs on countries that oppose his plans to take over the territory.

title: Syria agrees ceasefire with Kurdish-led forces after two weeks of clashes
content: President Ahmed al-Sharaa said the deal would allow the Syrian state to reassert control over most areas.

title: Israel pushes back on Trump's picks for executives on Gaza 'Board of Peace'
content: Israel says it is unhappy it was not consulted, and Palestinians have also been critical.

title: 'Abandoned' or 'business' - was Glasner right to 'attack' Palace owners?
content: Oliver Glasner's outburst after Crystal Palace were beaten at Sunderland has led to increased speculation over his future at the club but will he be sacked?

title: Spurs chiefs consider sacking Frank as fans turn
content: Tottenham head coach Thomas Frank is under significant internal scrutiny with the club considering calling time on his seven-month reign.

originalTitle: Barry secures deserved win for Everton against Villa
title: Barry secures deserved win for Everton against Villa
content: Everton's Thierno Barry capitalises on a mistake by Aston Villa's Emi Martinez for a 1-0 win to The Toffees, which stops Villa going second in the Premier League.
